item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0475; 09:42AM; 4211 E Verdant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t210Zq; Atwater Village; Two story office building (metal clad roof) with fire on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 E235 E250 E55 E56 RA56 RA835 T35 T50; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0396; 09:22AM; 720 S Ceres Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3i36mNn; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 90 firefighters extinguished the fire in 40 minutes with no injuries reported. It is uncertain as to the nature of the business housed in the structure but appears to be only ordinary combustibles (no chemicals, etc). LAFD PIOs are on scene for media availability. LAFD Arson is responding for the cause investigation per protocol for a Greater Alarm. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR11 AR17 AR21 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM21 CM22 E1 E11 E14 E17 E20 E202 E209 E211 E221 E233 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 PI2 PI4 RA17 RA27 RA4 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T11 T2 T21 T27 T33 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0396; 09:16AM; 720 S Ceres Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3i36mNn; Downtown; Firefighters have made good progress against the blaze. Ladder pipe operations will shut down and an interior fire attack will resume to root out the remaining pockets of fire. PIOs Captain Branden Silverman and Firefighter David Ortiz are on scene for media availability. No injuries reported.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM21 CM22 E1 E11 E14 E17 E20 E202 E209 E211 E221 E233 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 PI2 PI4 RA17 RA27 RA4 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T11 T2 T21 T27 T33 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0396; 09:01AM; 720 S Ceres Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3i36mNn; Downtown; This is a well-developed fire and the incident is now transitioning to a defensive operation. All firefighters are exiting the structure and coming down off the roof. LAFD Hazardous Materials Squad is evaluating a possible oxygen tank exposed to the fire. The type of business is still unknown. This will be an extended operation and traffic will be heavily impacted on E 7th St at Ceres Ave - please avoid the area. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E11 E14 E17 E20 E202 E209 E211 E221 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA27 RA4 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T11 T2 T21 T27 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0396; 08:58AM; 721 S Ceres Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pWrt8B; Downtown; This incident is now a Greater Alarm structure fire with over 90 firefighters assigned. Interior fire attack is facing heavy smoke and is working to locate the seat of the fire. The truck company conducted vertical ventilation and are getting heavy smoke from the holes. It is unknown at this time what type of business is housed in the structure. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E11 E14 E17 E202 E209 E211 E221 E27 E3 EM1 HR3 RA27 RA4 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T11 T2 T21 T27 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0396; 08:42AM; 721 S Ceres Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pWrt8B; Downtown; One story commercial building with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E11 E17 E202 E209 E211 RA4 RA809 SQ21 T11 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#0614; 11:54AM; 3376 Mesa Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pQPG05; Chatsworth; LAFD Air Operations is preparing for a hoist operation for a 67yo female in fair condition with a medical concern (no trauma incurred). Firefighters attempted to reach by ground but due to the trail access, an air operation was determined to be the safest option. The 9-1-1 call was received at 11:07AM. ; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 E106 E107 E296 E305 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA72 RA96 RH114 T105 T96; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0532; 10:43AM; 9149 W Cresta Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tNDK0p; Beverlywood; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters located and extinguished the attic fire in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E261 E294 E43 E58 EM18 EM9 RA43 RA858 RA94 T61 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0532; 10:22AM; 9149 W Cresta Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tNDK0p; Beverlywood; One story, single family dwelling with moderate smoke showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. The truck company conducted vertical ventilation and have heavy, pressurized smoke emanating, (while interior fire attack does not have fire visible fire inside) indicating an attic fire.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E261 E294 E43 E58 RA43 RA858 T61 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
